brainly_data.question: Which organ can be seriously affected by infectious mononucleosis?
brainly_data.subject: Biology

all_answers.question: Which organ can be seriously affected by infectious mononucleosis?
all_answers.subject: Biology
all_answers.text: The liver can be affected by mononucleosis. Although the spleen may play a part in fighting mononucleosis, it is the liver that can be affected.

top_answer.question: Which organ can be seriously affected by infectious mononucleosis?
top_answer.subject: Biology
top_answer.text: The liver can be affected by mononucleosis. Although the spleen may play a part in fighting mononucleosis, it is the liver that can be affected.
